| History                 =[[File:Serval Industries (Earth-616) from All-New X-factor Vol 1 1.jpg|left|250px|thumb|Serval Industries.]] [[Serval Industries]], a multi-billion dollar corporation operated by owner and CEO [[Harrison Snow (Earth-928)|Harrison Snow]] deals with a multitude of different business ventures which includes search engines, automobiles, mechanics, computers, weapons manufacturing, medical and genetics research to name a few. They also have the only corporate  sponsored [[Homo superior|mutant]] superhero team known as [[X-Factor (Serval Industries) (Earth-616)|X-Factor]].{{r|All-New X-Factor #1}}
